grid.sql: select a.*, $2::integer as userId from palk.cur_puudumine a where rekvid = $1

select.sql:
SELECT $2 :: INTEGER AS userid, 'PUUDUMINE' AS doc_type_id, p.id, p.lepingid, p.libid, p.summa, p.kpv1, p.kpv2, p.paevad, coalesce((p.properties ->> 'arvestatud_paevad')::integer, p.paevad) as arvestatud_paevad, coalesce((p.properties ->> 'arvestatud_paevad_j')::integer, p.paevad) as arvestatud_paevad_j, p.puudumiste_liik::varchar(20), p.tyyp, p.status, p.muud, t.parentid, -- coalesce((p.properties ->> 'palk_oper_id')::integer, 0)::integer as palk_oper_id, case when (p.properties ->> 'palk_oper_id') is not null and exists ( select 1 from palk.palk_oper po where po.parentid = (p.properties ->> 'palk_oper_id')::integer ) then (p.properties ->> 'palk_oper_id')::integer else 0 end::integer as palk_oper_id,
(p.properties ->> 'algorithm')::varchar(100) as algorithm, (p.properties ->> 'amet')::varchar(254) as amet, case when p.properties ->> 'puhkuse_summa' is not null and (p.properties ->> 'puhkuse_summa')::numeric > 0 then (p.properties ->> 'puhkuse_summa')::numeric(12, 2) when p.properties -> 'data' is not null and p.properties -> 'data' -> 0 is not null then (p.properties -> 'data' -> 0 ->> 'summa')::numeric else round((p.properties ->> 'avg_paeva_summa')::numeric * (p.properties ->> 'arvestatud_paevad')::numeric, 2) end::numeric(12, 2) as puhkuse_summa,
(p.properties ->> 'avg_paeva_summa')::numeric as avg_paeva_summa, case when p.properties ->> 'puhkuse_summa' is not null and (p.properties ->> 'puhkuse_summa')::numeric > 0 then round((p.properties ->> 'puhkuse_summa')::numeric / (p.properties ->> 'avg_paeva_summa')::numeric, 0) else (p.properties ->> 'arv_paevad_perioodis')::integer end::integer as arv_paevad_perioodis, p.properties ->> 'selg' as selg, coalesce((p.properties ->> 'konto'), '')::varchar(20) as konto, (p.properties ->> 'allikas')::varchar(20) as allikas, (p.properties ->> 'tegev')::varchar(20) as tegev, (p.properties ->> 'artikkel')::varchar(20) as artikkel, (p.properties ->> 'tunnus')::varchar(20) as tunnus, (p.properties ->> 'kpv1')::date as params_kpv1, (p.properties ->> 'kpv2')::date as params_kpv2, (p.properties ->> 'vm_kpv')::date as params_vm_kpv, (p.properties ->> 'kokkuleppe_summa')::numeric as kokkuleppe_summa, coalesce((p.properties ->> 'kas_arvesta_parandus')::integer, 0)::integer as kas_arvesta_parandus, pt.vs_kooded, pt.eesti as pt_nimetus, (p.properties ->> 'puudumiste_kood')::varchar(20) as puudumiste_kood, (p.properties ->> 'puudumise_tyyp')::char(1) as puudumise_tyyp, (p.properties ->> 'eelmise_puudumine_id')::integer as eelmise_puudumine_id, (p.properties ->> 'allikas_e')::varchar(20) as allikas_e, (p.properties ->> 'allikas_j')::varchar(20) as allikas_j FROM palk.puudumine p inner join palk.tooleping t on t.id = p.lepingid left outer join palk.com_puudumiste_tyyp pt on pt.liik = p.puudumiste_liik and pt.id = p.tyyp WHERE p.id = $1
select.sqlAsNew: SELECT $1 :: INTEGER AS id, $2 :: INTEGER AS userid, 'PUUDUMINE' AS doc_type_id, 0::integer as parentid, 0 :: INTEGER AS lepingid, 0 :: INTEGER AS libid, 0 :: NUMERIC(14, 4) AS summa, now()::date as kpv1, now()::date as kpv2, 0::integer as paevad, 'PUHKUS'::varchar(20) as puudumiste_liik, 0 as tyyp, 1 as status, null::integer as palk_oper_id, 0::integer as kas_arvesta_parandus, null::date as params_kpv1, null::date as params_kpv2, null::date as params_vm_kpv, null::text as puudumiste_kood, null::text as puudumise_tyyp, null::integer as eelmise_puudumine_id, null::varchar(20) as allikas_e, null::varchar(20) as allikas_j, null::text as muud

select.sql: select id, liik::varchar(20), eesti::varchar(120), vene::varchar(120), kas_luba_allikad::integer from palk.com_puudumiste_tyyp where kas_kehtiv

select p.id , p.eesti::varchar(254) as nimetus, pt.kood::varchar(20), p.liik from (select distinct unnest(p.vs_kooded) as kood from palk.com_puudumiste_tyyp p ) pt inner join palk.com_puudumiste_tyyp p on array[pt.kood] <@ p.vs_kooded where p.kas_kehtiv
SELECT * FROM jsonb_to_recordset(( SELECT p.data from palk.sp_import_puudumine_from_virosoft($2::integer, $3::integer, $1::JSONB) p ) ) AS x (error_message TEXT, error_code INTEGER, result INTEGER)
select * from palk.calc_avg_income_vacation($1::INTEGER, $2:: JSON) a order by a.puhkuse_summa desc, a.avg_paeva_summa desc

select x.kpv1, x.kpv2, x.paevad, case when x.toopaevad is null then palk.get_work_days(jsonb_build_object('kuu', extract(month from x.kpv1), 'aasta', extract(year from x.kpv1), 'paev', extract(day from x.kpv1), 'lopp', extract(day from x.kpv2)) :: JSON) else x.toopaevad end::integer as toopaevad, x.summa::numeric(12, 2), x.alus, x.palk_oper_id, coalesce(x.deleted, '0') as deleted, $2 :: INTEGER AS userid from jsonb_to_recordset( coalesce( ( select properties -> 'pk' from palk.puudumine p where p.id = $1 and p.properties ->> 'pk' is not null ), '[]'::jsonb || jsonb_build_object( 'kpv1', null::date, 'kpv2', null::date, 'paevad', 0, 'toopaevad', 0, 'summa', 0, 'alus', null, 'palk_oper_id', 0, 'deleted', '1') ) ) as x( kpv1 date, kpv2 date, paevad integer, toopaevad integer, summa numeric(12, 2), alus text, palk_oper_id integer, deleted varchar(1))

deleteDoc.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from palk.sp_delete_puudumine($1, $2)

executeCommand.sql: select error_code, result, error_message from palk.sp_calc_puhkuse_paevad($1, $2)

getLog.sql: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS id, (qry.ajalugu ->> 'user')::VARCHAR(20) AS kasutaja, coalesce(to_char((ajalugu ->> 'created')::TIMESTAMP, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH.MI.SS'), '')::VARCHAR(20) AS koostatud, coalesce(to_char((ajalugu ->> 'updated')::TIMESTAMP, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH.MI.SS'), '')::VARCHAR(20) AS muudatud, coalesce(to_char((ajalugu ->> 'print')::TIMESTAMP, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH.MI.SS'), '')::VARCHAR(20) AS prinditud, coalesce(to_char((ajalugu ->> 'email')::TIMESTAMP, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH.MI.SS'), '')::VARCHAR(20) AS email, coalesce(to_char((ajalugu ->> 'earve')::TIMESTAMP, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH.MI.SS'), '')::VARCHAR(20) AS earve, coalesce(to_char((ajalugu ->> 'deleted')::TIMESTAMP, 'DD.MM.YYYY HH.MI.SS'), '')::VARCHAR(20) AS kustutatud FROM ( SELECT jsonb_array_elements('[]'::jsonb || d.ajalugu) AS ajalugu, d.id FROM palk.puudumine d, ou.userid u WHERE d.id = $1 AND u.id = $2 ) qry WHERE (qry.ajalugu ->> 'user') IS NOT NULL
